Title: My Team Isn’t Happy With Changes I’m Making (Why?)
Description:
Today we’ll hear about: 

  • A business owner who’s changing his team’s roles, and they’re not happy 
  • A young business owner struggling to retain employees 
  • How Dave Ramsey handles firing team members 
  • A man wondering if it’s a bad idea to sell his company
